channel.title: Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings

item.title: C# 14 extension members; AKA extension everything: Exploring the .NET 10 preview - Part 3
item.description: In this post I look at the C#14 extension members feature. I show how to convert extension methods to the new syntax and how to add new types of extension. Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/exploring-dotnet-10-preview-features-3-csharp-14-extensions-members/

item.title: Behind the scenes of dotnet run app.cs: Exploring the .NET 10 preview - Part 2
item.description: In this post I looks at how the new single-file .NET run experience is implemented inside the .NET SDK, focusing on how the virtual-project file is built Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/exploring-dotnet-10-preview-features-2-behind-the-scenes-of-dotnet-run-app.cs/
